Package controller

Interface Features

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GUIController
    public interface Features
    This interface represents all the features supported by the controller for the GUI.

    • Method Summary

      • setView

        This method is the entry point for the controller to set the view.
        Parameters:
        guiView - the GUI object from view

        Parameters:
        type - type of portfolio
        name - name of portfolio
        optionSelected - type of buy

        void performancePortfolioMainMenu​(int pfIndex,
                                  int timestampType)
        This method instructs view to display the second screen for portfolio performance.
        Parameters:
        pfIndex - index of portfolio selected
        timestampType - timestamp selected by user

        name - name of stock
        stockSelected - symbol of stock

        Parameters:

        timestampType - timestamp type selected by user

      • buyStockSubmit

                    int stockSelected,
                    java.lang.String noOfStocks,
                    java.lang.String portfolioName)
        This method buys the stocks selected by user
        Parameters:
        date - date selected by user
        stockSelected - stock selected by user
        noOfStocks - number of stocks selected by user
        portfolioName - name of portfolio

               java.lang.String noOfStocks,
               int pfNumber)
        This method sells the stocks selected by the user.
        Parameters:
        date - date selected by the user
        stockSelected - stock selected by user
        noOfStocks - number of stocks selected by user
        pfNumber - portfolio number

                       int portfolioName)

        Parameters:
        buyOrSell - option selected by user
        portfolioName - name of portfolio
